mailPositive: Please enter the code you received at %VAR% (Check the spam folder if you do not receive a code).
mailFailedDescription:
We couldn't send the verification email to:
`%VAR%`

**Possible reasons:**
‚Ä¢ The email address doesn't exist
‚Ä¢ The email server rejected the message
‚Ä¢ There's a temporary delivery issue

Please double-check your email address and try again.
mailInvalid: Please enter only valid email addresses
mailBlacklistedDescription:
The email address you entered has been blocked by the server administrator.

This could be because:
‚Ä¢ The email domain is not allowed
‚Ä¢ The specific email has been banned

If you believe this is an error, please contact a server administrator.
mailTimeoutDescription:
You're sending emails too quickly.

Please wait **%VAR% seconds** before requesting another verification code.

This limit helps prevent spam and ensures reliable email delivery.
invalidPermissions: You are not allowed to execute this command!
commandFailed: There was an error while executing this command!
userRetry: An error occurred. Please remove and add the reaction to try again.
userBotError: Bot not properly configured. Please contact admin!
userEnterEmail: Please enter your email address to verify %VAR%.
userCantFindRole: Cant find roles. Please contact the admin! Help: Ensure that the name is still the same and that the bot role is higher in the serversettings role menu then the verified and unverified role.
emailText:
Welcome to %VAR%!

This is a code that will give you access to the Discord server.
Please only send this code to EmailBot via Discord to gain access. Please do not give this code to anyone who asks for it other than EmailBot.
Here is your access code: %VAR%
verifyEmbedInstructions:
Click the button below to start the verification process. You will receive a code via email.

Already have a code? Use the **Enter Code** button.
verifyDmDescription: Welcome to **%VAR%**! Click the button below to verify your email address and gain access to the server.
verifyDmAdminWarning: Note: The server admin can see the email address you use
emailModalHeader:
## Verify Your Identity
Enter your email address below to receive a verification code.
emailModalAdminWarning: ‚ö†Ô∏è **Note:** The server admin can see the email address you use.
emailModalAcceptedDomains: üìã **You must use an email from one of these domains:**
codeModalHeader:
## Almost There!
Check your inbox for the 6-digit verification code.
codePromptDescription:
A verification code has been sent to:
`%VAR%`

Click the button below to enter your code.
codePromptTipValue: Check your spam/junk folder. The email may take a few minutes to arrive.
mailInvalidDescription:
The email address you entered is not valid.

Please make sure:
‚Ä¢ The email has the correct format (name@domain.com)
‚Ä¢ You're using an allowed email domain
‚Ä¢ There are no spaces in the address
verificationSuccessDescription:
Welcome! You have been successfully verified.

**Role assigned:** %VAR%
**Server:** %VAR%

You now have full access to the server.
invalidCodeDescription:
The code you entered is incorrect.

**What to do:**
‚Ä¢ Double-check the 6-digit code from your email
‚Ä¢ Make sure you're using the most recent code
‚Ä¢ Request a new code if needed by clicking the verification button again
errorGenericDescription: Something went wrong while processing your request. The server administrator has been notified and will look into it.
errorNotifyChannelFailed: The configured error channel no longer exists or the bot cannot send messages there. Error was sent to you (the owner) instead. Please reconfigure using `/set_error_notify`.
errorNotifyUserFailed: The configured error notification user is no longer in the server or has DMs disabled. Error was sent to you (the owner) instead. Please reconfigure using `/set_error_notify`.
errorNotifySetOwner: ‚úÖ Error notifications will now be sent to the server owner via DM.
errorNotifySetChannel: ‚úÖ Error notifications will now be sent to #%VAR%.
errorNotifySetUser: ‚úÖ Error notifications will now be sent to %VAR% via DM.
errorNotifyInvalidChannel: ‚ùå Please select a text channel for error notifications.
errorNotifyUserNotInGuild: ‚ùå The selected user is not a member of this server.
errorNotifyStatusOwner: Error notifications are sent to the **server owner** (%VAR%) via DM.
errorNotifyStatusChannelInvalid: ‚ö†Ô∏è Error notifications are configured for a channel that no longer exists. Notifications will fall back to the server owner.
errorNotifyStatusUser: Error notifications are sent to **%VAR%** via DM.
errorNotifyStatusUserInvalid: ‚ö†Ô∏è Error notifications are configured for a user who is no longer in the server. Notifications will fall back to the server owner.
errorNotifyStatusNoteValue: If the configured notification method fails, errors will automatically fall back to the server owner.
errorRoleAssignMessage:
Failed to assign the verified/unverified role to a user. Please ensure:
‚Ä¢ The bot's role is higher than the verified/unverified roles
‚Ä¢ The roles still exist
‚Ä¢ The bot has 'Manage Roles' permission

üí° **Tip:** Either move the EmailBot role above the verified/unverified roles in Server Settings ‚Üí Roles, or assign the verified/unverified role to the bot directly.
[See example](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/lkaesberg/EmailBot/main/images/bothierarchy.png)
errorBotNotConfiguredMessage:
A user tried to verify but the bot is not properly configured.

**Required setup:**
‚Ä¢ Set allowed email domains with `/domain add`
‚Ä¢ Set default roles with `/role add` or domain-specific roles with `/domainrole add`

Run `/status` to check the current configuration.
